traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Javelin Expert
entries: Tasloi can use their Dexterity score for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

actions.name: Blowgun
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. 5 (1 + 4) piercing damage and 7 (2d6 damage) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for one hour.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
